resources.string: Correct USERNAME and PASSWORD are essential for successful login to the application. The USERNAME and PASSWORD are developer generated and can not be changed during the runtime of application as it violates security of the application.

Surveillance start after a countdown of 15 seconds. In this period of time the android device should be kept at secure location. The android device should be placed in the location where it captures a wide view of sucured area.

User contact number is the GSM mobile number where the SMS should be send after the intrusion.GSM number should be a valid 10 digit number without a STD code. The space is left blasnk if the contact numbers are not required.
A switch preference is located in settings activity. If a user want to send SMS on the occurrence of intrusion the switch preference can be turned on and vice versa
The images of intrusion are dynamically stored into gallery. There exist separate gallery for images and videos. Images or videos can not be deleted from these galleries for security purpose.
During intrusion a single image is captured which is followed by a continuos video recorder. This continuos video recorder can be stopped by calling the device.
